# Elixir Core Guide Index
> Deep‑dive resources for writing high‑quality, dependency‑free Elixir.

## Best Practices
- [Elixir Core Best Practices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/guides/elixir-core/elixir_core_best_practices.md)

## Anti‑Patterns & Code Smells
- [Elixir Official Code Smell Guide](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/what-anti-patterns.html) : Mirrored compile‑time docs.
